attributes.action: create a wall around Wythenshawe (Manchester) and turn it into an Escape from New York style prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the majority of people who live in Wythenshawe are useless, scrounging, worthless criminals and no use to society (speaking from experience unfortunately having to "live" there) we, the undersigned, urge the Prime Minister to either create a wall around Wythenshawe (Manchester) and turn it into an Escape from New York style prison or live there for a week to see what the few remaining decent people here are putting up with. Hopefully your car remains intact longer than the rest of ours.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
